app-description: Tập hợp chia sẻ và cộng tác cùng nhau trong một không gian ảo, riêng tư và an toàn

chat-sidebar.log-message.audio-normaliza: audioNormalization command needs a valid number parameter.
chat-sidebar.log-message.audio-suspended: Audio has been suspended, click somewhere in the room to resume the audio.
chat-sidebar.log-message.invalid-audio-n: audioNormalization command needs a base volume number between 0 [no normalization] and 255. Default is 0. The recommended value is 4, if you would like to enable normalization.
chat-sidebar.log-message.invalid-scene-u: This URL does not point to a scene or valid GLB.
chat-sidebar.log-message.room-entry-requ: You must enter the room to use this command.
chat-sidebar.log-message.unauthorized-ro: You do not have permission to rename this room.
chat-sidebar.log-message.unauthorized-sc: You do not have permission to change the scene.

discord-page.secondary-tagline: No downloads or sign up. Full VR support too.

exited-room-screen.closed-room-tos: A room may be closed by the room owner, or if we receive reports that it violates our <toslink>Terms of Use</toslink>.
exited-room-screen.connect-tcp: You can try connecting via TCP, which may work better on some networks.
exited-room-screen.contact-us: If you have questions, contact us at {contactEmail}.
exited-room-screen.create-room: You can also create a new room.
exited-room-screen.no-longer-availible: Sorry, this room is no longer available.
exited-room-screen.reason.closed: This room is no longer available.
exited-room-screen.reason.connect-error: Unable to connect to this room, please try again later.
exited-room-screen.reason.denied: You are not permitted to join this room. Please request permission from the room creator.
exited-room-screen.reason.disconnected: You have disconnected from the room. Refresh the page to try to reconnect.
exited-room-screen.reason.exited: Your session has ended. Refresh your browser to start a new one.
exited-room-screen.reason.full: This room is full, please try again later.
exited-room-screen.reason.version-mismat: The version you deployed is not available yet. Your browser will refresh in 5 seconds.
exited-room-screen.source-link: If you'd like to run your own server, Hubs's source code is available on GitHub.
home-page.communicate-blurb: Chọn một hình đại diện để đại diện cho bạn, đeo tai nghe của bạn và nhảy ngay vào. Hubs giúp bạn dễ dàng kết nối với trò chuyện thoại và tin nhắn với những người khác trong phòng riêng của bạn.
home-page.media-blurb: Chia sẻ nội dung với những người khác trong phòng của bạn bằng cách kéo và thả ảnh, video, tệp PDF, liên kết và mô hình 3D vào không gian của bạn.
home-page.media-title: Một cách dễ dàng để chia sẻ nội dung số
home-page.rooms-blurb: Chia sẻ không gian ảo với bạn bè, đồng nghiệp và cộng đồng của bạn. Khi bạn tạo phòng bằng Hub, bạn sẽ có không gian họp ảo riêng tư mà bạn có thể chia sẻ ngay lập tức - không cần tải xuống hoặc tai nghe ảo VR.
hubs-cloud-page.features.diy-events-desc: With Hubs Cloud, you can enable your own virtual events infrastructure by tailoring your deployment to meet your own needs for uptime, concurrency, and account needs.
hubs-cloud-page.features.self-hosted-des: With Hubs Cloud, your deployment is on your own organization’s infrastructure, keeping your sensitive data private and secure within an AWS account your team owns.
hubs-cloud-page.features.usage-pricing-d: Your cost to run Hubs Cloud will be dependent on the size of your deployed instances, bandwidth, and storage used. All billing is handled through AWS, so you’ll get visibility into charges at every step of the process.
hubs-cloud-page.hero-content: Hubs Cloud creates and manages all of the AWS resources needed to host your own immersive spaces from your company or organization’s own account. Bring your own domain or use Route53 to create a new site, running on a single EC2 instance or scaled up to multiple servers for greater system-wide concurrency. Easily customize your platform with your own branding, upload your own 3D content, or select from the vast array of avatars and scenes licensed under Creative Commons for the Hubs platform.
hubs-cloud-page.hero-cta: Get it today on the AWS Marketplace
